    projects

    Connect to Azure IoT Hub

    Connect DevKit to an Azure IoT hub that you create, collect the temperature and humidity data from sensors and send the data to IoT hub.

    MQTT HelloWorld

    Connect DevKit to a public free MQTT broker, send messages to the server and print it out if it is successful

    Remote Monitoring

    Send status of sensors on DevKit to Azure IoT Suite.

    Shake, Shake

    Use the motion sensor to detect shaking, and use a simple Azure Functions app to find a random tweet with a #hashtag.

    Your Ideas?

    We really want to hear about the cool and innovative ways you are using the DevKit. Please share your ideas with us to iot-devkit@microsoft.com.
